Uses of Interface
com.continuuity.loom.store.ClusterStore

Packages that use ClusterStore
com.continuuity.loom.http Http handlers implementing REST endpoints. 
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler Schedules threads for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs and tasks. 
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task Classes for coordinating tasks and jobs. 
com.continuuity.loom.store Persistent stores for admin definable entities, clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes.
